data.title: Belgium
data.meta_description: Since 2004, Lazard's Benelux team has been fully dedicated to providing Financial Advisory services. Find out more about our Belgium location here.
data.text:
The Lazard Brussels office is located in the ERTICO Blue Tower Louise. The building is most easily accessed through the Avenue Louise entrance. Office hours are 9.00 a.m. to 6.30 p.m., Monday through Friday. The entrance to Visitor Parking is located on Rue Vilain XIIII, underneath the building. Kindly note that parking spots require a reservation.

Visitors may take the lift from the garage to the main lobby. If parking, please collect a token at the main lobby reception desk for parking validation. Visitors may take the elevator up to our office, where they will be greeted by their host.

Our office may be reached by public transport. From the Bruxelles Midi (Brussels South) Eurostar station, visitors may take the STIB-MIVB Brussels Metro Lines 2 or 6 to Louise/Louiza Station, and then transfer to Tram routes 93 or 94 to the Vleurgat stop.
